message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $15,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you for $12,500. This price not only ensures a fair deal but also allows you to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable cost compared to its market value. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.
